description:
Power up your lawn

Single pouches available exclusively in Sunday Lawn Plans

Grass Powerhouse is a premium fertilizer blend designed for powerful, sustained growth and deep greening.

This is our go-to solution for lawns looking for strong, sustained growth. With its high nitrogen content, seaweed extract, and iron-rich formula, it not only deepens your lawns green color, this powerhouse pouch improves stress resiliency and growth.

A Sunday premium selection

Premium fertilizers, enriched with potent nutrients and unique soil enhancers, outperform standard options to deliver superior, long-lasting lawn health.

sections.product_features:
24-0-3 NPK (nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium) liquid lawn fertilizer
Premium fertilizer — concentrated nutrients and speciality ingredients
Supports rapid and extended growth and deep greening
Made for any lawn and grass type
Formulated without pesticides
Easy hose-on application
1 pouch covers up to 5,000 sq. ft.
Includes liquid fertilizer in flexible reduced plastic packaging and a custom-engineered universal hose-end sprayer
sections.ingredients:
Nitrogen: For dense grass growth
Potassium: For plant turgor, water management and resiliency
Seaweed extract: For stress resiliency
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or evening, and make sure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Connect the universal sprayer to your hose and the fertilizer pouch. This sprayer is designed for the optimal mix of water and nutrients.
Apply the fertilizer across your lawn until the pouch is empty, which should take about 10-15 minutes. Once the fertilizer dries, you can get back out on your grass.
Reapply every 4-6 weeks spring through fall. Keep the sprayer for future applications.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How does fertilizer help my grass?
Grass needs nutrients to thrive—just like any other plant. Fertilizer provides these essential nutrients, enhancing your lawn's growth, color, and resilience.
How are Sunday premium liquid fertilizers different?
Sunday's premium liquid fertilizers, once exclusive to custom lawn plans, are highly concentrated with nutrients, soil amendments, and specialty ingredients for effective and fast results.
How much lawn fertilizer will I need?
For each treatment: Each fertilizer pouch covers 5,000 sq. ft. for one treatment. The number of pouches you receive for each application will depend on your lawn size.
How to apply alongside other Sunday products
Sunday fertilizers are made to work together! If using Sunday liquid fertilizers wait at least one week between applications. For granular fertilizers wait 4-6 weeks. For all other lawn products, let the fertilizer dry on the lawn first then apply other products.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying?
Our ingredients break down quickly and don’t persist in the environment. After our products dry, you can get back to using your lawn!
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Liquid Lawn Fertilizer Instructions
Get a greener lawn with Sunday's nutrient-rich liquid lawn fertilizers. Follow our easy instructions and application tips for optimal growth and greening across your lawn.
